values: mr. dress up was a genius. dressing up leads to romance.

when you can't cross the river. when it's cold. eat sandwiches.





with your warm face on mine in the cold snow
tobogganing and romance is a most excellent combination.

I would:

1. buy a fancy gorilla suit.

2. go to hollywood and pay people to let me break things in my gorilla suit.

3. while vacationing in hollywood, i would go on a shopping spree and buy more fancy suits/outfits. 

4. buy a BIG collection of cartoon movies

5. buy king kong and take him to tea. (in my gorilla suit cause he'd eat me if i wasn't.)

6. buy a house in venice before it sinks.

7. when venice does indeed sink, i will become a real estate agent and sell the houses to the fishies.
and eating your boyfriends brain. it tastes better than he thinks.

new year will be full of new things. maybe new people?

kissing is the weirdest sensation. i'm addicted.

today william told me it's been one month since we confessed our feelings to eachother. it was rather cute... but i didn't have the heart to tell him that it actually hasn't been one month yet. it was perhaps a nice thought though.

fantastic night. and i even went bowling!

concert went very well indeed. boys look so fancy in jazz/senior band uniforms.

last night. first date. first time saying no to drugs. first time holding someone who was high. 

fun stuff?

okay, so i adore him. i'm allowed to.


concerts coming soon, can't wait.

first snow of the winter :)


and i have a boyfriend now
we are anytime. so i did it tonight. confessing feelings has never felt better.
....aaaand still on the agenda... stop wussing out. i hAVE feelings too!
the colours are gone. even in the fallen leaves. and it snowed. farewell

i had a romatic thought today, after a night of disappointment. that instrument doesn't know how lucky it is.



on the agenda: confess feelings.

scream my name just one more time...




everything seemed to be going perfectly. of course it got messed up. i saw it coming too but if all this stays bottled up i'm going to be a mess sooner or later
an extended hug right after nearly being killed is probably just what i needed.

i was walked home again today. this time, he thanked me for letting him walk me home. 

what a gentleman.
walked home in the dark after jazz band today. fortunately, a gentleman walked me home.

halloween. strange and wonderful things are happening.


in other news, i flipped a 200 pound guy off me and kicked his ass.
william and i had a long chat about feelings.

good news today

found my ipod
and its funny how life brings people together

our house isnt decorated for halloween. but frank the sheep is (:

i know i can't make you love me, but i sure am having fun trying. oh, and being loved by everyone else is nice too. 

gotta change your evil ways baby. 'fore i stop loving you. -santana
compliments sure are nice things. and i'm bad with birthdays. and friends. ugh.
i do love coffee houses. so cozy.

dancing for halloween tonight. and i admit my costume was selected to impress certain individuals... funny how it seemed to impress the wrong people.


i'll get my chance. i rather hope its soon. i also love bright red lipstick!

so today i stumbled over that frank character on the front page. that sheep made my day.


seems everyone's in a romantic mood. at least the people i'm talking to. i'm just not. i think my greatest love became sleep long ago.

"Trying hard to forget that cold October day, when Love challenged Freedom to a fist fight. freedom looked victorious; but no one was expecting the outcome on that baseball diamond... When Love reached beneath her plaid jumper, pulled out a switch blade, and drove it... Directly through the heart of St. Angeles." -Alexisonfire last night was fun. i remembered today that i had caffiene, which is why i stayed up even later to write this memory poem: my ears are still ringing from the sound of tonight. mosh pits, and mascara again. lights and hugs and sandales with backup dancers and electrical tape. multicoloured drum stands and hats that are so big that they cover your eyes. and the engergy. full of boys with fancy hair, blonde hair. they all look so nice. and the drummer's chest, and that guy who shat his pants in the crowd. no leather boots tonight. pink instead. there's talk of the girl who everyone wants. i don't notice, because i can't remember whose arms i was last nobody notices. we're all dancing! by me.
